title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama GitHub repo: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models; supports RAG, multi-user, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs with model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Lightweight Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, completion, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool written in Go that wraps Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform, single binary, no external dependencies.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community-maintained Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama, WebUI, and optional GPU runtime configs.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that provides injectable Ollama service with RxJS streams for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and model pulling with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 6+ client library for Ollama; provides synchronous and asynchronous APIs with strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app that exposes Ollama models via REST and GraphQL endpoints with admin UI for prompt tuning.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that connects to Ollama; supports markdown, code highlighting, and session memory.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; includes FastAPI backend and React frontend.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server via slash commands and threads.
